Requirement_Text: User shall login using email and password
System shall validate email format before registration
Application shall integrate with PayPal payment gateway
Password must be encrypted using AES-256 algorithm
System shall implement two-factor authentication
All API communication shall use HTTPS protocol
User passwords shall be hashed using bcrypt
System shall respond within 2 seconds for all requests
Application shall handle 1000 concurrent users
Page load time shall not exceed 3 seconds
System shall use less than 100MB memory
Database queries shall complete within 500 milliseconds
System shall have 99.9% uptime availability
Application shall recover from crash within 1 minute
System shall handle 5 simultaneous errors without crashing
System shall backup data every 24 hours automatically
Application shall maintain data integrity during power failure
UI shall be intuitive for first-time users
User shall complete registration within 5 clicks
System shall provide clear and helpful error messages
Interface shall support keyboard navigation
Application design shall be visually appealing
User shall learn basic features within 10 minutes
Help documentation shall be easily accessible
Code shall follow PEP-8 coding standards
All functions shall have docstring documentation
System shall use modular architecture design
Code shall have minimum 80% test coverage
System shall allow easy addition of new features
Changes shall not break existing functionality
Code complexity shall be kept minimal
System shall run on Windows Linux and macOS
Application shall work on Chrome Firefox and Edge browsers
System shall be installable via standard installer
Application shall coexist with antivirus software
System shall be deployable on cloud platforms
Application shall run on mobile and desktop devices
System shall allow export of data in multiple formats
Keywords: export data CSV JSON XML format

Requirement_Text: User shall be able to search using filters
Application shall send email notifications automatically
System shall log all user activities for audit
Access to admin panel shall require authentication
Session shall timeout after 30 minutes of inactivity
System shall detect and block SQL injection attempts
Application shall validate all user inputs
System shall calculate totals with 99.9% accuracy
Reports shall be generated within 10 seconds
System shall compress files before upload
Application shall cache frequently accessed data
System shall handle network disconnection gracefully
